ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re:  message that had no meaningful title
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Mara! Here is a link to the spreadsheet. Not sure how correct it is - especially 56 and up - but it should be close.
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Mara!

Here is a link to the spreadsheet. Not sure how correct it is - especially
56 and up - but it should be close.

http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly/exp.zip

I do still like playing my bard at 54 but my time is now divided between a
53 Cleric, 51 Enchanter, and some miscellaneous lower level characters (34
Wiz, 23 Ench, 12 Clr, 8 Rogue). Most of the time, I play on 2 PC's side by
side. Lately, doing mostly guild events killing various epic mobs: General
4 times, Big Ele a few times, the Monk skelly in LIO for the first time this
week, swimming in the big lava crater last week, etc.

According to that spreadsheet:

58 HEF Bard gets 72%
49 HIE Pally gets 28%

But remember that the 49 Pally needs lots less exp points to fill his bubs -
so to him it could look like he is getting "more" exp. E.g.: they kill 200
mobs and pally gets 2 bubs while bard gets half a bub. Who got "more" exp?

Sylly



-----Original Message-----
From: rkroads@... [mailto:rkroads@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2000 10:12 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: message that had no meaningful title


Thank you thank you Sylly!!

Are you still playing your bard much?

I would love the spreadsheet if someone has it please :).

Maravana Vireo
Who is having a very serious discussion with her paladin husband about
whether there is a minor or more severe experience split discrepancy in a
group between a 49th level and a 58th level person, and is getting cold hard
data to back her up ;)
Troubador of Deadly Virtues
Mithaniel Marr
